summary: Offline interchange manifest describing the layered geometry set and safe export anchors.

numerology.notes: All geometry executors respect these values to keep depth and ratios aligned.

layers.title: Vesica Field

layers.title: Tree of Life
layers.description: Ten sephirot plus Daath, with twenty-two calm paths between pillars.

layers.title: Double Helix
layers.description: Phase-shifted lattice tying two still strands with thirty-three rungs.
